channel.title: Meditation(s)
channel.description: anyone else here meditate? me and JDB just had a huge discussion on how his way of meditating and the way my religion defines it out very similair, so i'm asking does anyone else here meditate and/or empower themselves spiritually, (i.e. awakening the chakras, cleaning and/or seeing /feeling your or other peoples auras) and if you do are yours anything like the ones here: http://www.angelfire.com/empire/serpentis666/Satanic_Meditation.html

item.title: Meditation(s)
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

MastrChief:

JDB meditates??

yes,

MastrChief:

I tried meditation and apparently failed because all it did was piss me off more.

well if you try some beginner stuff and get back into it im sure you’d be amazed,

Read full topic

item.title: Meditation(s)
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

I tried Wiccan meditation (don’t know any proper names for it. The kind where you’re supposedly able to hear the Goddess talk to you in your head) for like a week. One time, I felt kind of dizzy afterwards. Then, feeling like my aura was strong enough, I tried telekinesis and I was able to get a hanging pencil to rotate from 2 feet away, lol. Never really tried since then, but I think I may get back in to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Meditation(s)
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I’ve done a lot things through means of meditation, and I try to meditate at least three times a day, when I wake up, when i get home from school, and as a relaxer when I’m about to go to bed.

I’ve tried astral projection, and I’ve only succeeded once, and it was like nothing I have ever felt before.

I had my Dad help me clean out my chakras I think when I was 10 or 11 years old, but then when I started to study Wicca, I did it again myself.

There is a type of yoga that I practiced for a few months that I learned from a friend. The trick is to stay perfectly still for as long as you possibly can while just visualizing on one thing, I can do this now for about an hour and a half after about 4 months of practice, and I now use it as another tool in my witchcraft.

People use meditation for many means.

Read full topic

I do

-Mh

item.title: Meditation(s)
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:6, topic:155787”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=212598.msg1857893#msg1857893 date=1193819980]

astral projection as in this?
http://www.666blacksun.com/Meditations_for_Astral_Projection.html

Yes. Although I do not believe in the whole “soul” thing… I just say it’s an out of body experience.
Never had a proper one though. I’ve became objects many many times though. Being a boat launch ramp was fun!

lol, you should’ve done some more beginner stuff before that and you may have actually done it, me on the other hand have mainly just been empowering myself spiritually for the past month and today i finally saw and felt my aura, it wasn’t that strong, but i’m glad i did it.
[/quote]
Like I said though, I’m [a] lazy [prick] and would rather just smoke salvia or do a strong psychedelic.[/quote]
i know, i’m just saying you probly wouldv’e had it if you tried some beginner things

Read full topic
